text: I forgive my mom for being a psycho and my dad for being a loser.
author: Nikki Sixx

text: It is a sad commentary of our times when our young must seek advice and counsel from 'Dear Abby' instead of going to Mom and Dad.
author: Abigail Van Buren

text: I hear my friends and my mom tell me I'm special, but honestly, I still don't get it.
author: LeBron James

text: My mom and I have always been there for each other. We had some tough times, but she was always there for me.
author: LeBron James

text: I don't want to have kids for like 10 years. I still have a lot to do. I don't even know if I could handle a dog right now. I'm so not ready. Someday I'll be a mom but not until I'm in my 30s.
author: Avril Lavigne
